message.body: (1/2) Hey I emailed you earlier today about the MacBook you had on Craigslist. I was wondering if you were firm on the price. Bc I looked online for a quote on
(2/2) mac2sell and it gave me a quote of 130. If we can meet somewhere in the middle at 140 that'd be awesome.
I priced it mainly by looking at going rates on eBay, but every single person who has contacted me has tried to negotiate down by ten or fifteen dollars haha
You seemed the nicest about it so there ya go!
(1/2) Haha awesome. Thanks! I'm actually busy tonight after 6. If its b4 that around 4 or 5 i can stop by. If not the earliest i can stop by is tomorrow morning
Just text when you are on way or call if I don't respond
Hey Ingrid something came up. Are you available tommorow morning? Sorry for changing the time.
I won't be around tomorrow but how about Sunday?
I can also drive to you
If today is a transportation issues. My bf and I are leaving for NY at 4pm
(1/2) Something just came up in the morning. I probably won't be free till around 3. I live in ths far NE. If you want to meet up on your way to N.Y. we can do
(2/2) that or we can do Sunday. Up to you.
Let's meet up on our way to NY! 3 sounds perfect- text if plans change and if not, send me address and I'll head over
(2/2) xt. When you're around the area. Thanks!
